Welcome to Sackets Harbor Central School

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 13px;

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 13px;

br.span: The Sackets Harbor Central School Community is dedicated to educational excellence as we empower our students to embrace life's challenges with knowledge, character, and a commitment to learning as they become contributing citizens in the American democratic way of life.

em.a: Click to learn more about our district!
